page.title: 05THE BUTCHERS SHOPIN LANGTOFT
page.content: A butcher is someone who mainly sells meat but our butcher who is called Trevor sells,sausage,cheese,yogurt eggs,crabsticks and stuffing. Crabsticks are about 8cm long and are sticks of fish with a crab flavouring. Stuffing is used to keep the meat moist while it is cooking the stuffing also tastes nice.The product that he sells most of is beef.The busiest days of the week are Friday and Saturday. Trevor said he did not need any special training to be a butcher he started at school and worked his way up.He also said the thing he liked most about being a butcher was meeting people.When you walk in the shop on the left is a counter where he displays cheese,yogurt and pies the counter is like a fridge that keeps things cool. To cut the meat he has an a laege wooden block and many knives.
